title: Olaf Scholz - Wikipedia
snippet: Olaf Scholz (born 14 June 1958) is a German politician who served as the Chancellor of Germany from 2021 to 2025. A member of the Social Democratic Party (SPD), he previously served as Vice Chancellor in the fourth Merkel cabinet and as Federal Minister of Finance from 2018 to 2021.

title: Olaf Scholz
snippet: Olaf Scholz has been Federal Minister of Finance and Vice-Chancellor of the Federal Republic of Germany since March 2018. Scholz was born in the German city of Osnabrück in 1958, grew up in Hamburg and is married. In 1985, he completed his ...

title: Olaf Scholz | Facts, Biography, Cabinet, & Chancellor of Germany | Britannica
snippet: Olaf Scholz is a German politician who became chancellor of Germany in 2021. A longtime member of Germany’s center-left Social Democratic Party (SPD), Scholz served as finance minister and vice chancellor (2018–21) in the ‘grand coalition’ government of Angela Merkel before succeeding her as chancellor.

title: Olaf Scholz Biography: Age, Net Worth, Family & Career Highlights - Mabumbe
snippet: As Chancellor, Scholz prioritized climate change initiatives, supporting renewable energy transitions, green technologies, and international climate agreements. Olaf Scholz has been married to Britta Ernst since 1998.

title: Olaf Scholz - Biography - IMDb
snippet: Olaf Scholz. Self: Farbe bekennen. Olaf Scholz was born on 14 June 1958 in Osnabrück, Germany. He has been married to Britta Ernst since 1998.
